summary:
Results-driven Senior Backend Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience building scalable backend systems
using Java, Kotlin, Spring Boot, SQL, NoSQL, and cloud platforms (AWS, GCP). Proven success in delivering high-
impact backend services, improving observability and reliability, and supporting systems serving hundreds of
millions of users. Strong background in data modeling, messaging systems, and production operations. Adept at
cross-functional collaboration, rapid problem solving, and improving team velocity through code quality and
mentorship. Passionate about creating eﬃcient, reliable solutions and continuously growing through learning and
team leadership.
summaryAlt: Full-stack Software Engineer with experience delivering user-facing features and backend services across large-scale consumer platforms. Strong collaborator with product, design, and engineering partners to ship measurable improvements to engagement and discoverability.

highlights.summary: 5+ years building scalable backend systems and distributed services.
highlights.detail: Designed, shipped, and supported production systems using Java/Kotlin, Spring Boot, SQL/NoSQL, and cloud messaging.

highlights.summary: Improved observability and reliability on critical services.
highlights.detail: Implemented tracing and testing improvements to reduce debugging time and accelerate delivery.
Worked on platforms supporting tens to hundreds of millions of users with measurable adoption and engagement wins.

highlightsAlt.summary: Full-stack delivery across high-traffic product surfaces.
highlightsAlt.detail: Built end-to-end features spanning UI, APIs, and data flows with a focus on usability and measurable outcomes.

highlightsAlt.summary: Cross-functional execution with product and design.
highlightsAlt.detail: Partnered with PMs, designers, and stakeholders to ship iterative improvements and validate impact.

highlightsAlt.summary: Strong engineering fundamentals with product-minded framing.
highlightsAlt.detail: Balances backend rigor with user-facing quality, experimentation, and performance.

experience.summary:
Designed, maintained, and deployed distributed backend services supporting pricing, logistics, and vendor
communication systems. Worked across GCP infrastructure, pub/sub messaging, relational databases, and test
automation to ensure service reliability and production readiness. Collaborated with cross-functional teams on
architecture, debugging, and last-mile delivery under tight deadlines.
experience.summaryAlt: Senior Software Engineer contributing to cross-functional initiatives across backend services and internal user-facing tools.

impact.summary: Implemented trace context propagation across multiple Pub/Sub services, enabling full end-to-end observability and reducing root-cause debugging time by 30%.
impact.detail: Enabled end-to-end observability across distributed services handling pricing, logistics, and vendor communication.

impact.summary: Built a reusable E2E testing framework with templates, a dynamic test data generator, and onboarding docs to reduce manual setup time by 50%.
impact.detail: Created templates, dynamic test data generators, and onboarding documentation to standardize testing.

impact.summary: Delivered last-minute architectural fixes to resolve critical production blockers before deployment, preserving delivery timelines for systems used by 1,000+ internal users.
impact.detail: Managed Pub/Sub topics, BigQuery tables, and scheduled queries to ensure reliable data flow.

impact.summary: Owned GCP resources including Pub/Sub, BigQuery tables, and scheduled queries, optimizing data flow across 100,000+ daily events
impact.detail: Coordinated PostgreSQL and Oracle schema changes while maintaining production stability.

impact.summary: Led backend deployments and schema changes for PostgreSQL and Oracle databases across 5+ services, ensuring reliable rollouts and maintaining zero-downtime standards.
impact.detail: Coordinated PostgreSQL and Oracle schema changes while maintaining production stability.

impactAlt.summary: Improved distributed system observability by implementing trace propagation across services.
impactAlt.detail: Partnered with cross-functional teams to debug and validate end-to-end request flows.

impactAlt.summary: Introduced reusable E2E testing patterns to accelerate service onboarding.
impactAlt.detail: Reduced setup friction for engineers by standardizing test scaffolding and documentation.

impactAlt.summary: Maintained reliability for high-volume data pipelines supporting internal tools.
impactAlt.detail: Worked closely with stakeholders to ensure correctness and visibility.

impactAlt.summary: Executed coordinated backend releases across multiple services.
impactAlt.detail: Maintained reliability standards during schema and deployment changes.

experience.summary: Designed and built backend services and GraphQL APIs powering user-facing dashboards, collaborating cross-functionally to ensure scalability, performance, and reliability. Contributed to CI/CD pipelines and Docker based deployment, automated testing, and production deployment processes to improve system reliability.
experience.summaryAlt: Full-stack Software Engineer delivering backend services and user-facing features for profile enrichment, notifications, and discovery experiences.

impact.summary: Designed and launched a profile enrichment system using Java, Kotlin, Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, and AWS S3, increasing profile completeness by 50% and improving discoverability for millions of job seekers.
impact.detail: Built backend services using Java, Kotlin, Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, and AWS S3 to ingest, validate, and persist profile data.

impact.summary: Enabled profile-based discovery for 40M+ US and 230M+ global users by leading launch-critical backend service development in Java, resolving 10+ production issues and building dashboards to monitor adoption.
impact.detail: Led backend service development, resolved production issues, and built dashboards to monitor adoption.

impact.summary: Built and deployed scalable microservices using Kotlin and Spring Boot, integrating with REST APIs and PostgreSQL, and automating infrastructure setup with Terraform to interact with AWS S3.
impact.detail: Implemented A/B tests and optimized delivery flows in collaboration with product teams.

impact.summary: Improved email engagement for external profiles by leading backend and frontend eﬀorts and utilizing A/B testing, achieving a 15–20% uplift in open and conversion rates.
impact.detail: Integrated services with PostgreSQL, AWS S3, and internal APIs to support long-term growth.

impact.summary: Reduced feature delivery time by ~25% using AI-assisted development tools; collaborated with UX and PMs to optimize user flows and acceptance criteria.
impact.detail: Led retrospectives, improved onboarding documentation, and supported team delivery.

impact.summary: Mentored 3+ new engineers, led retrospectives, and introduced process improvements that enhanced team communication post-reorg.
impact.detail: Led retrospectives, improved onboarding documentation, and supported team delivery.

impact.summary: Contributed minor frontend refactors to support backend-driven privacy workflows.
impact.detail: Led retrospectives, improved onboarding documentation, and supported team delivery.

impactAlt.summary: Delivered profile enrichment features that improved user discoverability and engagement.
impactAlt.detail: Worked across backend services and UI surfaces to support richer profile experiences.

impactAlt.summary: Expanded profile-based discovery across global markets.
impactAlt.detail: Partnered with frontend engineers and designers to ship end-to-end features.

impactAlt.summary: Improved email engagement through coordinated frontend and backend experimentation.
impactAlt.detail: Used A/B testing insights to iterate on copy, timing, and delivery flows.

impactAlt.summary: Contributed full-stack improvements alongside backend service ownership.
impactAlt.detail: Enhanced UI flows while maintaining backend performance and reliability.

impactAlt.summary: Supported team growth through mentorship and collaboration.
impactAlt.detail: Helped teammates ramp quickly and maintain delivery velocity.

experience.summary:
Focused on backend service reliability through automated API testing, CI/CD integration, and validation of distributed system workflows. Designed and executed automated tests for backend RESTful services to ensure
stable integrations across frontend and backend systems. Collaborated with developers and QA to define test
plans, acceptance criteria, and improve automated tests coverage in a fast-paced Agile environment.
experience.summaryAlt: Software Engineer contributing to test automation and quality initiatives across backend and UI-integrated systems.

impact.summary: Automated UI and REST API tests for 15+ features using Java, Selenium, and REST Assured, reducing regression testing time by 50%.
impact.detail: Used Java, Selenium, and REST Assured to validate backend service integrations.

impact.summary: Improved test automation workflows and CI/CD pipelines in a SAFe Agile environment, increasing iteration velocity by 37%.
impact.detail: Enhanced automated testing pipelines in a SAFe Agile environment.

impactAlt.summary: Built automated test coverage to ensure backend service reliability.
impactAlt.detail: Collaborated with developers and QA to define acceptance criteria.

impactAlt.summary: Streamlined test automation processes to accelerate delivery.
impactAlt.detail: Integrated testing improvements into CI/CD pipelines.

education.program: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
